species.tip: In the summer, almost always flying high above the park.
Seen and heard year round.  Likes to perch near the top of trees.
Freqently seen grazing or resting in the valley behind the basketball court.
Rarely seen in the valley behind the basketball court.  Look for motion under the vegetation.
In the summer of 2013, several large rat snakes fell from the trees above the children's playground.
Medium tree near the drinking fountain, up above the basketball court.
Often seen and heard in the woods behind the dog park and in the trees on the other side of the valley.
Common high in the trees, especially on the borders of the park.
Look carefully on the trees, it may be creeping.
Look in the circle, Look in the trees
Sometimes heard howling at night in the forest.
Sometimes heard calling at night from the woods.
